## Government Tender Announcement

### PW-__XL-166-41185: Workforce Management Solution

**Publication Date:** 2022-10-28
**Tender Closing Date:** 2023-01-27T14:00:00
**Request for Proposal (RFP) ID:** G9292-229825/B

The Public Works and Government Services Canada, in partnership with Employment and Social Development Canada (ESDC), invites proposals for the procurement of a Workforce Management Solution (WMS) to support ESDC's Benefits Delivery Modernization Program (BDM).

### Background

The BDM program aims to provide world-class service delivery enabled by advanced technologies. Delivering WMS capabilities is a key component of BDM, providing a holistic and national view of the ESDC workforce. The objectives of a workforce management tool for BDM include transforming ESDC's workforce management operating model, enabling a multi-Channel service delivery, and supporting a modernized WMS strategy.

### Requirement

ESDC requires a commercially available WMS that provides stakeholders with a holistic view of the ESDC workforce across Citizen Services Branch, Call Centre, Processing, and Integrity Services Branch functions. The solution must be scalable to manage an estimated workforce of up to 15,000 personnel. Only SaaS WMS hosted on a Shared Services Canada certified protected B platform will be considered.

### Submission Instructions

* Electronic submissions can be made using the Canada Post Corporation (CPC) Connect service.
* USB keys may be sent via mail or courier to the PWGSC Bid Receiving Unit.
* Late bids will only be accepted if the bidder can prove that the delay is due to a CPC delay.

### Important Information

* Proof of timely delivery must include a CPC cancellation date stamp, Priority Courier bill of lading, or Xpresspost label.
* Misrouting, traffic volume, weather disturbances, or labor disputes will not be accepted as a reason for late delivery.
* Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

### Contact Information

* Contracting Authority: Public Works and Government Services Canada
* Email: Lindsey.Isidoro@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* Phone: (873) 455-0981
* Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, QC K1A 0S5

### Additional Information

* The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.
* Documents may be submitted in either
